solution_line_template: She got {num_fillings} fillings at a cost of {num_fillings} * ${cost_filling} = $<<{num_fillings}*{cost_filling}={cost_of_fillings}>>{cost_of_fillings}.
Thus, Wendy paid ${total_bill} - ${cost_of_fillings} - ${cost_cleaning} = $<<{total_bill}-{cost_of_fillings}-{cost_cleaning}={cost_extraction}>>{cost_extraction} for the tooth extraction.
